text: Alfred Ridley-Martin (9 May 1881 – 6 May 1970) was a British fencer. He competed at the 1912 and 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:1970 deaths Category:British male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Great Britain Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:People from Lewisham
title: Alfred Ridley-Martin
